name: Catting Sim
description:
Features
  • be cat! cute lil menace >:3c
  • 1 old man being sad :(((
  • being a cat at the sad man so he gives you food cheers up
  • 1 old man flirting with the sad man??
  • a lot of adorable cat noises
  • a buncha words probably! i didn't count them (~20 minutes play time)
  • 2 endings but they're both good ones

If you're having trouble with the web version, try downloading it instead! Ren'Py's web support is still in beta so sometimes it's grumpy :/

Team
  • DragonQuills- team lead, programmer, writer, jack-of-all-trades extraordinaire
  • Kit Hadduck - sprite and background edits
  • Elliot Lane - writing

And also thanks to Aidan and Maya for debugging and proofreading help!

Content Warnings
  • Death of a spouse (mentioned, occurred pre-game)
Credits
  • Cat sprites by DoubleFree
  • Human sprites by Carlmary
  • Backgrounds were all found on Pixabay and made by various creators
    • Town center
    • Docks
    • Outside of house
    • Living room
    • Kitchen
    • Main Menu Paws
  • All meows were recorded or created by creators on Pixabay
    • Hello, Hi, and Inquisitive
    • Demanding
    • Short and long purr
    • Dismay
    • Noooo!!
  • Title font is Meows by Aisyah
